selectLanguage.title: Select Your Language

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Our mission is to enhance global wellness through science and innovation.

content.text: Global Fitwell was born from the belief that everyone deserves access to wellness solutions that are safe, effective, and based on scientific evidence. Our team consists of nutrition experts, scientists, and fitness enthusiasts dedicated to researching and developing products that make a real difference in people's lives.

We are committed to transparency, quality, and sustainability in everything we do. From sourcing the purest ingredients to conducting rigorous third-party lab testing, our priority is your trust and your results.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Your trust and data protection are our highest priority.

content.text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name and email when you subscribe to our newsletter or fill out a contact form. We also collect technical data automatically via cookies, such as your IP address and browser type, to enhance your experience.

We use your information to process orders, personalize your experience, and communicate with you about our products and offers. We will never share your personal data with unaffiliated third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.subtitle: By using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

content.text: This website and its content are for your personal, non-commercial use. You may not modify, copy, distribute, or sell any information obtained from this site. Access is permitted only to adults of legal age.
All content, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Global Fitwell and is protected by international copyright laws.

cookiesPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPage.subtitle: How we use cookies to improve your experience.

content.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us remember your preferences, understand how you use our site, and customize content and advertising.
We use essential cookies for site functionality, performance cookies to analyze traffic, and functional cookies to remember your choices. We also use marketing cookies to show you relevant ads.

faqs.question: Is this template free?
faqs.answer: Yes. It is a free Next.js Shadcn template.

faqs.question: How can I customize the style?
faqs.answer: You can customize colors and fonts directly in the `app/globals.css` file using Tailwind CSS v4 theme variables.

devCampaignSimulatorPage.title: Campaign Simulator
devCampaignSimulatorPage.subtitle: Select a campaign variant to preview the landing page.

5-superfoods-diet.title: 5 Essential Superfoods to Add to Your Daily Diet
5-superfoods-diet.subtitle: Boost your health with these nutrient powerhouses that nature offers.
5-superfoods-diet.author: Dr. Sophia Rossi
5-superfoods-diet.featuredImageAlt: A colorful bowl of superfoods, including berries and nuts.

content.text: In a world full of complex diets and supplements, sometimes the most powerful solution lies in simple, natural foods. Superfoods are nutrient-dense foods considered to be particularly beneficial for health and well-being. Here are five of our favorites that you can easily integrate into your routine.

These small red berries are a powerhouse of antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals. They help fight free radicals, support vision, and can boost the immune system. Add them to your morning yogurt or smoothie.

galleryImages.alt: Detail of the KineticBand Pro material

description.text: The KineticBand Pro is designed for elite athletes looking to maximize their potential. Made with durable materials and an ergonomic design, it offers progressive resistance to improve strength, speed, and agility.

step0.title: Step 0: Identification
step0.description: This is the foundational step. The information here defines your campaign's identity and strategy.
step0.baseCampaignDescription: Select the base product for this new variant.
step0.seoKeywordsDescription: Separated by commas. They will be used to generate the URL.

step1.title: Step 1: Page Structure
step1.description: Define the basic framework. Including a header or footer is a key strategic decision.

galleryDescriptions.StandardHeader: Standard header with logo, navigation, and CTA.
galleryDescriptions.StandardFooter: Complete footer with links and newsletter.
galleryDescriptions.BenefitsSection: Showcases key benefits in cards with icons.

step2.title: Step 2: Layout Composition
step2.description: Build the visual narrative of your page. Drag sections from the library to the canvas and reorder them to define the user's journey.
step2.emptyCanvasText: Drag or add sections here to build your layout.

step3.title: Step 3: Visual Theme
step3.description: Define the personality of your campaign. Your choices here will be instantly reflected in the live preview.
step3.composerDescription: Select and preview your theme components. Changes will be reflected in real-time.

step4.title: Step 4: Content
step4.description: Bring your layout to life. Click on 'Edit Content' for each section to add the persuasive text in all supported languages.
step4.emptyStateDescription: Go back to Step 2 to add sections to your campaign.

step5.title: Step 5: Management & Publishing
step5.description: You're at the final step. Review the configuration and choose the final action for your new campaign variant.
